mongoose.enchant: Permanently enchant a Melee Weapon to occasionally increase Agility by 120 and attack speed slightly.  Requires a level 35 or higher item.
mongoose.mats: 6 Voice Crystal, 10 Large Prismatic Shard, 8 Greater Planar Essence, and 40 Arcane Dust.

major defense.enchant: Permanently enchants bracers to increase your defense rating by 12.  Requires a level 35 or higher item.
major defense.mats: 2 Small Prismatic Shard and 10 Arcane Dust.
